properties.displayName: Control allowed fsgroup on pods in a Kubernetes Cluster
properties.description: This policy controls valid ranges for FsGroup (File System Group) on volumes in a Kubernetes cluster. For instructions on using this policy, please visit https://aka.ms/kubepolicydoc.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
List of Kubernetes namespaces to exclude from policy evaluation. Providing a value for this parameter is optional.

metadata.displayName: Rule for a pod to confirm to FsGroup ranges.
metadata.description: The rule for how pods may confirm to the given FsGroup ranges. Either 'MayRunAs', 'MustRunAs, or 'RunAsAll'. For more information, visit https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/policy/pod-security-policy/#volumes-and-file-systems
Enter valid ranges from 'min' to max' for the fsgroup used in a pod's security context.
